input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example: BMC_ARS_System, HP_ServiceCenter, ServiceNow

An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The incident concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The incident concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.
An XML document containing failed incidents.
String Value - Count of successful incidents
String Value - Count of incidents that failed creation.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure.
String Value - A process specific explanation for the value of success status.

call-process.process-name: :AutoPilot-OA-Incident_Management:Utilities:Translate Field Values to Enumerated Values For Single Incident

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="XML" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:value-of select="//item/metadata/status" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

xpath-expression.xpath: concat("Unable to create incident because of the following: ", .)

documentation.description: This workflow will create an incident.
